data.taskTitle: create task summary upon completion that gets shown in history > task detail
create task summary upon completion that gets shown in history > task detail
data.approach: 1. Create API endpoint /api/tasks/[id]/summary that fetches signal data, combines with task info, and calls Haiku to generate summary. 2. Add Summary tab to TaskDetailPaneB.svelte. 3. Display formatted summary with key metrics from completion bundle.
